description.p: Followers of the dear goddess Selune.

A little soul drifting thru the night. Lost under the stars catches eyes on a beautiful light, a silhouette of a gorgeous woman, the Moonmaiden herself. She reaches out to the soul enlighten it and grants the little one new power of life. Now infused by the magic of the nightsky the little soul got a new life as part of Selune's followership.

A Lunari looks like a elvish human with the beauty of a Drow. They are considered one of the most beautiful beeings known and got a very slightly glow of moon light on their skin. Their eyes are white during the day becoming more and more silver at night peaking at midnight.

Selune sometimes infuse an unborn elf or half-elf with her magic or granting lost souls a new life. Sometimes she just does it on her own and sometimes she gets asked to. Maybe even makes a deal with them. Thos who abandon Selune get their life energy drained little by little. Sometimes fast, sometimes slowly.

Lunari can live in any society but have unique abilities which differ from the usual people. Some may like them, some don't. They have a higher social status than every other common elf or high elf due to their connection to Selune.

Lunari know that they are beautiful but rarely rely on it or use it to their advantage. The few who does use it got what the want with ease. In general, they are most likely gentle and gracile but can also be hateful and wrathful. Lunari love the autumn, like the winter, dislike the spring and summer.
Born Lunari usually have names like elves or humans. Reborn ones may keep their previous name.

Ability Score Increase.Your Charisma score increases by 2. In addition, one ability score of your choice increases by 1.
Age.Lunari age like elves. Very loyal may live for ever.
Alignment.Usually Lunari tend towards a chaotic good alignment.
Size.Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Celestial.Your creature type is additionally considered as celestial.
Vision of the Night.You can see normally in dim light and darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.
Restless Eyes.You no longer need to sleep. To gain the benefits of a long rest, you can spend all 8 hours doing light activity.
Fey Ancestry.You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic canâ€™t put you to sleep.
Languages.You can speak, read and write in Common, Elvish and Celestial.
